literalExpression.text: {"clientKey":"dpsbx91fh7b0ve3qbfuoa0f7brme513i","href":"https://api-us.boxever.com/v2/connections/a857d8f1-6f36-47e7-8687-8e57e2614999","ref":"a857d8f1-6f36-47e7-8687-8e57e2614999","name":"Get City from MaxMind","description":"Get the city of an IP address using MaxMind geolocation api","modifiedByRef":"171e2c01-9026-4573-bed2-f556d8b37bf5","modifiedAt":"2022-02-02T21:59:54.143Z","revision":1,"archived":false,"auth":{"authType":"BASIC","username":"Redacted"},"request":{"requestType":"GET","connectionUrl":"https://geolite.info/geoip/v2.1/city/${ipAddress}"},"inputMappings":[],"outputMappings":[{"label":"City","outputReference":"city","type":"Object"},{"label":"Country","outputReference":"country","type":"Object"},{"label":"Location","outputReference":"location","type":"Object"},{"label":"Subdivisions","outputReference":"subdivisions","type":"Array"}],"customHeaders":[{"name":"Accept","value":"application/json"},{"name":"Accept-Encoding","value":"gzip"}],"urlParameters":[{"label":"IP Address","key":"ipAddress","type":"string","exampleValue":"174.0.167.183","mapping":"ipAddress","data":{"type":"Programmables","label":"Get Guest IP Address","value":"ipAddress","dataType":"string","firstInGroup":true}}],"systemType":"DATA_SYSTEM","connectionTimeout":1000,"socketTimeout":1000,"icon":"fad fa-chart-network"}

{"clientKey":"dpsbx91fh7b0ve3qbfuoa0f7brme513i","href":"https://api-us.boxever.com/v2/connections/f59fd04e-dc92-41bc-83ac-436efaf8123c","ref":"f59fd04e-dc92-41bc-83ac-436efaf8123c","name":"Azure Translation","description":"Translate text using azure translate api","modifiedByRef":"171e2c01-9026-4573-bed2-f556d8b37bf5","modifiedAt":"2022-02-03T20:59:43Z","revision":1,"archived":false,"auth":{"authType":"NONE"},"request":{"requestType":"POST","connectionUrl":"https://api.cognitive.microsofttranslator.com/translate?api-version=3.0&from=${inputLanguage}&to=${outputLanguage}","requestBody":"[{\"text\":\"${text}\"}]"},"inputMappings":[{"label":"Text","key":"text","type":"string","exampleValue":"welcome","mapping":"welcomeText","data":{"type":"Programmables","label":"Get welcome text","value":"welcomeText","dataType":"string","firstInGroup":true}}],"outputMappings":[{"label":"Result","outputReference":"result","type":"Array"}],"customHeaders":[{"name":"Accept","value":"application/json"},{"name":"Accept-Encoding","value":"gzip"},{"name":"Content-Type","value":"application/json"},{"name":"Ocp-Apim-Subscription-Key","value":"Redacted"},{"name":"Ocp-Apim-Subscription-Region","value":"eastus"}],"urlParameters":[{"label":"Input Language","key":"inputLanguage","type":"String","exampleValue":"en","mapping":"\"en\""},{"label":"Output Language","key":"outputLanguage","type":"string","exampleValue":"fr","mapping":"browserLanguage","data":{"type":"Glossary","label":"Guest Language","value":"guest.language","dataType":"string","firstInGroup":true}}],"systemType":"DATA_SYSTEM","connectionTimeout":1000,"socketTimeout":1000,"icon":"fad fa-chart-network"}

outputEntry.text: "{{translatedWelcomeText}} PLAY! Summit {{firstName}}, we see you're visiting us from {{location}}."
"{{translatedWelcomeText}} PLAY! Summit, we don't know who you are yet and we see you're visiting us from {{location}}."
"{{translatedWelcomeText}} PLAY! Summit {{firstName}}, we see you're visiting us from somewhere on planet earth."
